# Sentence Retrieval for mRASP

Scripts for calculating sentence retrieval accuracy for mRASP.

1. Download and decompress tatoeba 15-way parallel testset.
```bash
# todo
```

2. Evaluate on the testset
```bash
bash accuracy_ted.sh
```

## Results
* mRASP align
